name: all_strains_descending
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool weed_strain.
Tool description: Basic information on all weed strain. Build mobile apps for weed strains.
API description: Fetches a list of all weed strains ordered in a specified descending order from the RapidAPI Weed Strain API.

ordering.description: The attribute by which to order the strains in descending order (e.g., 'name', 'thc', etc.).
